articles.title: 'The Director's Cut Is the Movie We All Thought We Were Releasing' — Russell Crowe Responds to Robin Hood's 'Unfair' Comparisons to Gladiator, 16 Years Later
articles.title_tr: 'The Director's Cut Is the Movie We All Thought We Were Releasing' — Russell Crowe Responds to Robin Hood's 'Unfair' Comparisons to Gladiator, 16 Years Later
articles.summary: Remember the 2010 Robin Hood movie? The one directed by Ridley Scott with Russell Crowe in the title role? It struggled at the box office and reportedly resulted in a loss during its theatrical release. Now, 16 years later, Crowe has discussed its various problems, which weren’t helped by comparisons to Scott and Crowe’s blockbuster Gladiator.
articles.summary_tr: Remember the 2010 Robin Hood movie? The one directed by Ridley Scott with Russell Crowe in the title role? articles.title: Weapons Director Zach Cregger Was Given "Carte Blanche" To Reinvent Resident Evil For The Big Screen
articles.title_tr: Weapons Director Zach Cregger Was Given "Carte Blanche" To Reinvent Resident Evil For The Big Screen
articles.summary: Zach Cregger's Resident Evil movie could be a fresh break from its source material, as the Weapons director has been given "carte blanche" to do whatever he wanted with the IP. According to Constantin Film CEO Oliver Berben--the company is the primary rights holder and producer of live-action Resident Evil movies--explained that the movie is "far away from everything that is connected to Resident Evil," as the company is aiming to tap into Cregger's unique style for this project."With Resident Evil, we have had an incredible journey with one of the most successful international IPs of more than a billion dollars in box office for many years and now we are creating something new, not just a new story idea, but to allow a new generation to take the IP into their own hands and form something different," Berben said to Deadline.Usually, video game adaptations cherry-pick from the source material to create something that looks and sounds familiar, but still tells an original story. There are exceptions to the rule--like HBO's The Last of Us TV series, which is mostly faithful to the video games--but most of these projects deviate from the video game IP.Continue Reading at GameSpot

There are exceptions to the rule--like HBO's The Last of Us TV series, which is mostly faithful to the video games--but most of these projects deviate from the video game IP.Continue Reading at GameSpot

Teknoloji devi, bu yıl stratejisini değiştirerek geleneksel Geliştirici Önizlemeleri yerine “Canary” kanalını devreye soktu. articles.title: Yes, God of War Sons Of Sparta Dev Takes Its Name From A Real, Adorable Cat
articles.title_tr: Yes, God of War Sons Of Sparta Dev Takes Its Name From A Real, Adorable Cat
articles.summary: A God of War 2D action platformer probably wasn't on anyone's bingo card for the recent State of Play livestream, but not only is the game real, but it's also out right now for PS5. God of War: Sons of Sparta is a new project from Mega Cat Studios, a developer with a very cool name and a storied history since its founding in 2015--as well as a heartwarming story behind how it settled on its studio name.On the PlayStation Blog, Mega Cat Studios founder and CEO James Deighan revealed that a real feline helped inspire the identity of the studio. Continue Reading at GameSpot

articles.title_tr: YÖK Başkanı Özvar açıkladı. İşte kontenjanı azaltılacak bölümler
articles.summary: Yükseköğretim Kurulu (YÖK) Başkanı Erol Özvar, program kontenjanlarında 3 yıldır yapılan azaltmanın bu yıl da süreceğini söyledi. Geçen yıl devlet üniversitelerindeki hukuk, eczacılık, diş hekimliği gibi bölümlerde yapılan azaltmanın vakıf üniversitelerinde de yapılacağı açıklandı.

articles.title: Was Tullis-Joyce's 'tactical injury' a smart move? Fara thinks so
articles.title_tr: Was Tullis-Joyce's 'tactical injury' a smart move? Fara thinks so
articles.summary: Fara Williams suggests that Phallon Tullis‑Joyce's 'tactical injury' was a clever move, as it gave Manchester United players the chance to receive instructions - guidance that subsequently contributed to their goal in the 2–1 victory over London City Lionesses.

articles.title: Vakıf Leasing'ten 2025'te 1,53 milyar lira net kâr
articles.title_tr: Vakıf Leasing'ten 2025'te 1,53 milyar lira net kâr
articles.summary: Vakıf Leasing, 2025 yılında aktiflerini yüzde 17 artırarak 36,3 milyar liraya çıkarırken, 1,53 milyar liralık net kâr ve yüzde 30 öz kaynak büyümesi sağladı.

articles.title: Android 17 Kurduk ve Denedik! İşte Yenilikleri!
articles.title_tr: Android 17 Kurduk ve Denedik! İşte Yenilikleri!
articles.summary: Android dünyasında büyük bir değişim kapıda. Android 17 sürümü, kod adıyla Tarçınlı Çörek (Cinnamon Bun), beraberinde getirdiği yeniliklerle kullanıcı deneyimini bambaşka bir noktaya taşımayı hedefliyor. Genellikle iOS ile kıyaslanan akıcılık ve optimizasyon konularında bu yeni sürümle birlikte Android telefonlarda ciddi bir performans artışı yaşanacağı iddia ediliyor. Yeni animasyonlar, güncellenen ikonlar ve menü geçişlerindeki pürüzsüzlük sayesinde […]
